item.title: Logic Apps improvement suggestions
item.description: I must say that Logic Apps has come a long way in its brief lifetime. It’s surprisingly easy to get up and go with Logic Apps and the number of available connectors is crazy. However there are still a couple of things that could be improved to make it friendlier for the more serious applications. Here’s my list. The last few weeks I had the chance to spend a lot of time with Azure Logic Apps.
